description: Group alerts by day if grouped alerts are found and add required classes
replace:
$1 is="$groupedAlerts is not empty">$4 $5$groupedAlerts" key="$dateGroup" value="$dateAlerts">

  • {$dateGroup}

      $5$dateAlerts$7$8 js-inlineModContainer {{ ($alert.isUnviewed() && $alert.isRecentlyRead()) ? '' : 'menu-row--alt' }}$9
